ticket.title: I am receiving an error when starting a rails server
ticket.original-body:
Am running ruby ver 1.87, Ubuntu 10.04,gem ver 1.3.6,rails-3.0.0.beta3
when i run $ruby script/rails server thin
to start the server i get this error, i have tried for two days without a solution can someone help me?
script/rails:10:in `require': no such file to load -- rails/commands (LoadError) from script/rails:10
ticket.latest-body:
Am running ruby ver 1.87, Ubuntu 10.04,gem ver 1.3.6,rails-3.0.0.beta3
when i run $ruby script/rails server thin
to start the server i get this error, i have tried for two days without a solution can someone help me?
script/rails:10:in `require': no such file to load -- rails/commands (LoadError) from script/rails:10
ticket.original-body-html:
Am running ruby ver 1.87, Ubuntu 10.04,gem ver 1.3.6,rails-3.0.0.beta3

when i run $ruby script/rails server thin

to start the server i get this error, i have tried for two days without a solution can someone help me?

script/rails:10:in require': no such file to load -- rails/commands (LoadError)<br/>

from script/rails:10

version.title: I am receiving an error when starting a rails server

version.body: You'll need to add **gem 'thin'** to the project's Gemfile.
version.body-html: You'll need to add gem 'thin' to the project's Gemfile.
